Luminous Arc's versatile controls allow you to choose between +Control Pad and left/right-handed stylus controls!

name: Lusitania
summary: Welcome aboard the RMS Lusitania, a luxurious ocean liner sunk by a German U-boat during World War 1. Immerse yourself in this detailed unique experience of how this great liner met its final moments.

name: Lunar 2: Eternal Blue Complete
summary: Remaster of the complete version of Lunar: Eternal Blue, released as part of the Lunar Remastered Collection bundle.

name: Luminary
summary: Luminary is a solo or 3 player co-op Openworld Action RPG that creates a balanced, accessible experience for everyone. Using a unique world and character progression system, explore vast hand-crafted lands together, uncover hidden treasures, level up your town, and push back the darkness with light.

name: Luminos
summary: When the colours of the world are no more… Little Lumi must embark on a journey across a variety of wonderful sceneries to bring them back. Let the adventure begin!

name: Lure Of Passion
summary: "Lure of Passion" is an adult game about a simple fisherman living in a old hut… who somehow keeps catching more than just fish.

name: Lutter
summary: Lutter is a game comprised of single screens full of traps, obstacles, enemies and items that the eponymous hero Lutter must navigate in order to find six missing damsels and the enormous monsters that hold them hostage. The game has some element of non-linearity, as there are numerous paths that split off to explore. The chief goal is to find keys that unlock doors to new areas and eventually to large, screen-sized bosses that Lutter must defeat in shoot 'em up style boss fights. The game also features a few RPG aspects: Lutter has a health bar and can level up, which increases his health and other stats. He defeats enemies by charging into them, similarly to early action RPGs like the first Ys and Hydlide. When defeated, the game will automatically try to bribe the victorious monster with whatever funds the player has accrued: should they have enough to placate the monster (this amount often depends on the strength of the monster) Lutter reappears where he entered the screen with his health restored.

name: Lupin III: The Master File
summary:
Lupin III: The Master File is a collection of materials related to the production of the Lupin III anime from 1971 to 1994. This includes character sheets, location maps, original sketches, music, poster scans, and plot summaries.

An expanded edition of Master File was released on DVD and Blu-Ray on March 28, 2012.

name: Lunar Strike
summary: Lunar Strike blends speculative fiction with a game world grounded in hard science. The game focuses on compelling survival and character-driven storytelling over combat. A race against time to preserve the evidence of humanity’s presence on the Moon before its inevitable collapse and destruction.

name: Lunacid
summary: Lunacid is a first person dungeon crawler inspired by old FROMSOFT games like Shadow Tower and King’s Field.

name: Lucid Falls
summary: Manipulate gravity, space and time, and survive terrifying nightmares in a deeply atmospheric lucid dream. Facing terrifying creatures, and solving challenges that bend reality, every moment reveals more of the dark truth behind Lucid Falls.

name: Luna's Diary
summary: A 3D platformer based on rhythms by various instruments! Enjoy building the music with multiple instruments inside of a diary world!

name: Lunar Lancer
summary: LUNAR LANCER is a shoot 'em up for the Nintendo Game Boy, released in 2024 to celebrate the console's 35th anniversary.

name: Lurch
summary: Multiplayer horror game where you and your friends are hired to work on an old house. Only after the completion of the tasks at hand will you be permitted to leave.

name: Lunatic Fringe
summary:
A space shooter, originally packaged as a module for After Dark, a screensaver program for Macintosh System 7. Programmed by Ben Haller.

Playable on Mac OS X using "Fringe Player 2", an app programmed by Greg Parker for Sealie Software in 2007.

name: Ludo's Quest
summary:
Ludo's Quest is a side-scrolling platformer inspired from Super Mario Bros and Ghosts 'n Goblins. Fun for the young and old. Complete all 16 levels.
Want more levels? Become a game designer and craft your own with the built-in level editor. You can even publish your levels on the web to share with friends and family. Play levels others have crafted.

name: Luna Child no Saishuu Bouei Line
summary: A doujin game by ENAMEL SWORD based on the Touhou Project series.

name: LuxeRacing
summary:
Race, Upgrade, and Trade LUXE Supercars in a variety of game modes, across a multitude of high quality digital environments!

Explore our virtual racing worlds, or challenge your friends - the racing never stops!

Real-Feel Racing meets the Blockchain.

Utilizing Smart Contracts, NFT's, and Unreal Engine 4.27

name: Luke The Hybrid
summary: 1-4 Player Action Created By Jacob Boehm (Dulmari_Creations) Set In a Post Apocalyptic Dystopian Future Where Hybrids Must Battle Robots. Explore In The Open World Campaign, Fight Each other In The Multiplayer, And Survive Waves of Bot Zombies.

name: Lust Academy: Season 1
summary: Lust Academy is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel about adventures and studying in the school of magic and wizardry. Play as a young guy who got invited to Cordale Academy. The whole world full of sorcery and passion awaits you!

name: Lunar New Year Lanterns
summary: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Lunar Legend
summary: You play Alex, a young boy who hopes to one day be a Dragonmaster like his dearly departed hero Dyne. One day, a wizard named Nash comes into town, and needs an escort to a nearby shrine in the woods. You, your childhood friend Luna, and your flying cat-like pet Nall accompany Nash to the shrine, and your adventure begins.

name: Lunacy: Saint Rhodes
summary: Lunacy: Saint Rhodes is a first-person survival horror game. Explore your dark family history and experience a gut-wrenching feeling of terror. You are being watched; never alone, never safe.

name: Luigi's Requiem
summary: Luigi Is Lost in this haunting Nightmare! Can you escape or will you be lost in your mind forever!!!

name: Lush Grove
summary: Step into Stillness. Wander Through Wonder.

name: Lumen: The Last Hope
summary: A story-driven adventure puzzle game where light is your only ally. Play as Lumen, the last beacon of hope, and harness the power of colors, each granting unique abilities to solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and restore a world lost to darkness.

name: Lured
summary: Lured is a 3-player co-op puzzle adventure. A previous team of explorers were lost trying to uncover a lost ancient secret, it's up to you and your 2 partners to uncover the mystery. Strong teamwork is the key to overcoming the traps and puzzles you discover. Will you find the truth?

name: Lu Ye Xian Zong
summary:
A platformer in which the player has to guide the characters from the film with each of them having their own abilities. The plot follows that of the 1939 movie.

Many of the graphics are ripped from numerous other games. The title screen bears a strong resemblance to Castle of Dragon's intro. Barza from Kyoryu Sentai Zyuranger is used in the cutscenes, the "To Green Castle" signs are taken from Mickey Mousecapade, the "Good luck!" message in the opening story being taken from Crossfire, the windows in the first level are likely re-edits of those from Hummer Team's Aladdin pirate, and Willy from Rockin' Kats shows up several times in the ending sequence.

As well as this, the mushroom enemy is taken from Don Doko Don 2 and the small one-eyed green blobs that the frog spits at you are the aliens from one of the bosses in Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers for NES, while one more enemy is from Little Samson. A few enemies are taken from Panic Restaurant, such as the jumping sausage (re-colored to green). The last boss is copied from Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers 2 being re-drawn in other colors and with new attacks.

The music is original, but the sound engine is stolen from Konami. Many of the sound effects also come from Konami games, most notably the death sound being the same as the one in Contra.

name: Lucius
summary:
“Here is wisdom. Let him that hath understanding count the number of the Beast: for it is the number of a man; and his number is Six hundred threescore and six.” - Revelation 13:18

When little Lucius was born on the devilishly significant date of June 6th, 1966, no one expected him to be anything other than a normal little boy. His childhood, spent in a luxurious manor, was as normal as every kid’s childhood years - well, except for the extreme wealth of his parents, as Lucius grew up with everything he desired and more. Everything went to Hell, in a manner of speaking, when Lucius turned 6. The Devil, who is his real father, manifests himself in his dreams the night before his birthday revealing to Lucius his true heritage. It’s up to Lucius to bring Hell on Earth using any and all means necessary.

Orchestrate deadly accidents, using items, tools, and hell’s powers such as telekinesis and mind control. By combining classic adventure gameplay with the freedom and openness of a 3D world, you’ll have to use your wits and ensure no one knows of your fiendish mission until it’s too late!

name: Lunatix
summary: Enter the twisted dreamworld of Lunatix in this first-person psychological horror experience. As a test subject you'll navigate a distorted and ever-changing landscape, where reality blurs with nightmare. Solve interactive puzzles to unravel the mysteries of your subconscious and the forces at play.

name: Luigi's Mansion: First-Person Optimized
summary: A simple modification aimed to optimize the game-play of Luigi’s Mansion to accommodate a first-person perspective, made possible using an Action Replay code by Laser Crusader. This novelty hack makes the game fully playable through the eyes of Luigi, transforming the GameCube classic into an unusual sort of FPS; one focused on hunting ghosts in a spooky mansion, presented as a lighthearted adventure with some eerie undertones.

name: Luna Online: Reborn
summary: Luna Online: Reborn is an anime themed MMORPG set in the cute fantasy world of Blueland. The world is in chaos, join forces with your friends and push back the monsters that threaten Blueland!

name: Lust Kingdom
summary: Lust Kingdom is a free-to-play hentai RPG with dating sim elements, in which you become the heir to a kingdom! Build relationships, have sex with concubines, gather your army, and conquer new lands to make the Lust Kingdom great again!

name: Lunar: Silver Star Harmony
summary: While seemingly placid on the surface, the world of Lunar is slowly descending into chaos, as the Goddess Althena, the creator and guardian of the world, has disappeared and the valiant efforts of the legendary Dragonmaster Dyne and his faithful companions fade into obscurity. With Althena gone and no one able or willing to become the next Dragonmaster, a shadowy figure, known only as the Magic Emperor, has started plotting to usurp Althena's place and become a god. In a remote village far removed from the decay that is slowly spreading throughout the world lives a young man named Alex, who dreams of one day becoming the next Dragonmaster like his hero Dyne. One day, Alex's friend Ramus convinces him to head towards a cave near town, where it is rumored the legendary White Dragon resides. With Alex's adopted sister Luna and his mysterious pet Nall in tow, Alex heads off on what seems to be a meaningless adventure, not knowing that it would be the first step in an epic journey with the fate of the entire world at stake.

name: LunarLux
summary:
LunarLux is filled to the brim with Sci-Fi references, scientific facts, quirky & lovable characters, and a fantastic Moon to explore; filled with technologically advanced Space Colonies and Cities, as well as Ancient Ruins of a civilization long forgotten.

Science and Knowledge...is the ultimate power. Soon, humanity will witness the infinite potential of the universe’s strongest cosmic energy: Antimatter!

Experience thrilling battles with a Hybrid Turn Based x Action Battle System!

Your skills will control the outcome! Shield against Enemy Attacks! Upgrade your skills to deal extra damage! Enhance your experience with 30+ Support Skills.

Master Stacking to perform powerful Lux Combos!

Solve puzzles in secret dungeons, explore a refreshing new RPG world, and battle the Murks that threaten humanity’s survival!

name: Lust Campus
summary: Lust Campus is a multi-adventure graphic novel with an emphasis on eroticism and intimacy, with with a diverse cast of complex characters with whom you can connect and meet, and who evolve (or not) thanks to your decisions throughout the story. In LC you will find a game with a femenine gaze an empathy driven storytelling.

name: Lucky Season: King of Fools - Collector's Edition
Luna and the Moonling
summary: Luna and the Moonling is an adventure puzzle game starring two adorable friends that must work together to save their kingdom. Inspired by the greatest “push block” puzzle gameplay of the past, Luna and the Moonling offers hours of relaxing yet challenging fun!

name: Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai - DX Pack
summary:
Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai - DX Pack is a deluxe edition of the game that includes:
- A copy of the game
- A school girl's sailor uniform
- A collection of posters from Lucky Star
- A school nameplate and pin

There was also some pre-order bonuses that included such as a CD-ROM featuring various voice overs, a PC fighting game featuring characters from Lucky Star and a balsamic vinegar trap.

name: Luigi and the Forest Ruins Rebooted: Green Comet
Lunar Impact
summary: Go to the Moon to explore its harsh nature and mysterious anomalies. Build your own lunar base, craft equipment, extract valuable resources and make many discoveries. Overcome the challenges of extreme lunar conditions, an oxygen-free atmosphere and much more unknown...

name: Lunar Rover
summary: Explore the surface of the Moon aboard the Lunar Rover and discover famous landing sites. From the Apollo space program to the Soviet Luna missions, there are plenty of sites to explore. Experience driving in lower gravity on a unique open world map.

name: Lunorbit
summary: You are the last stand against a hoard of asteroids headed towards the moon! Pilot your ship and crash into the asteroids to destroy them, but be careful. Stray too far from Luna and your engines will cut out. Easy to play but hard to master, Lunorbit will challenge your skills as you manage gravity, thrusters, and crazy g-forces.

name: Lumba: Hangover
summary: Experience the thrilling aftermath of Lumba's destruction in LUMbA: HANGOVER! The substance has spread to four new victims, led once again by Pal. Together, they will engage in a doomed crusade across their world in this fast-paced, top-down shooter.

name: Lucky Night
summary:
Welcome to the world of Lucky Night. Enjoy a brand new life in Virtual Reality.
Lucky Night is a VR social platform. You can make more friends and play fantastic games by VR equipment and intuitive ways of interactive.

name: Lunatika
summary:
New strange minimalistic indie horror quest adventure game with atmospheric dark mood, mystic storyline and pixel art.
Are you brave enough to check that strange sounds?
Are you ready to go up and face monster?
What if monster is you?

name: Luppy
summary: Luppy is a 2D platformer featuring 32 handcrafted levels filled with traps, enemies, and platforming challenges. Players collect coins to unlock a hidden trophy in each stage in order to progress, while making use of special abilities such as umbrella gliding and winged flight. The game emphasizes precise controls, varied mechanics, and a lighthearted, character-driven presentation.

name: Luigi's Final Ghost Hunt
summary: This is a mod for the original Luigi's Mansion that takes place in the future with an old Luigi, new ghosts, and a new mansion as well.

name: Lunacraft
summary: Lunacraft (originally called Mooncraft) is a moon-themed Minecraft-type game for the iOS. It includes many features that other iOS games of this genre do not have, such as Crafting, Mobs, and collecting different Materials. It is available on the App Store for free, but you can purchase an in-game guide and/or get rid of the ads for extra cost. Lunacraft was created, and is being developed, by Mode of Expression, LLC.

name: Lumen World of Color
summary: Lumen World of color is an action adventure game made as a student project.

name: Lumberhill
summary: Lumberhill is an action multiplayer party game for up to 4 players. You can either play locally or join friends online, playing in Coop Mode or 2v2 Versus Mode. Working as a team, you and your fellow lumberjacks must cut down trees and fight side by side to get the job done.

name: Lucky Luke: On the Dalton's Trail
summary: You, as Lucky Luke, have to stop the Dalton gang from making another crime. Walking around town you have to solve puzzles, shoot criminals and collect money. After finishing the level you have a chance to buy an extra life with the money collected. Shooting isn't ordinary, often Lucky needs to ricochet shots to hit his target. The game view sometimes changes from 2D style to behind the shoulders. The levels differ from town exploring, to bottle-shooting in a bar, to freeing hostages on the roof of train, to Indian sneaking. But, all of them lead Lucky to $1,000,000 for the capture of the Daltons.

name: Lust 'n Dead
summary: Destroy enemy waves one after another using an extensive range of weapons as you attempt to save the town from invasion! Improve your arsenal, level up, find the cure and witness some hot adult action!

name: Luna and the Crystal of Light
summary: A young fairy from Floralia, with the gift of speaking with animals, lives a tender magical adventure among forests, stars and friendship.

name: Lumber Valley
summary: Lumber Valley is a logging simulation game where you build and grow a logging business. Cut wood, process materials, and complete contracts to expand your operations. Unlock upgrades, automate production, and explore a quarry to uncover valuable resources while overcoming various challenges.

name: Luddite Rampage
summary: Welcome to your next contract. The client wants this office ruined — machines wrecked, data wiped, and those smug AI bots turned into scrap. No questions asked. Just you, your tools, and a building full of overpriced tech begging to be smashed.

name: Lupin the Third Part III: Jigoku no Kyuushutsu Sakusen
Lupin the Third Part III: Sanjou! Kogane no Ude
Lucky Tower
summary: Lucky Tower is an escape game that lets you play as a knight stuck in a tower, and your only goal is to escape. Pick a door to go through on each floor to find out if it will take you one step closer to the exit or if it will serve you your death with a funny little animation. Escaping the tower without dying is near impossible, so brace yourself!

name: Lunavania
summary: Lunavania is an Anime pixel horizontal action shooting game with unique pixel art style and roguelite elements.The game has rich build structures, over a hundred different styles of weapons, equipment, skills, which can be infinitely stacked and freely combined to experience the fun of meat pigeons.

name: Lunacid: Tears of the Moon
summary: Lunacid: Tears of the Moon is a First Person Dungeon Crawler made with the Sword of Moonlight - King’s Field making tool from 2000. Explore various dungeons for powerful weapons and spells to forestall the previsioned end of the world.

name: Luke Muscat's Ultimate Golf Challenge
summary: A challenging and surreal journey to master the perfect golf swing.

name: Lup
summary: Lup is a 2D platformer with heart, throughout the game you'll have to overcome enemies and challenges using weapons and items.

name: Lumen
summary: De-stress in a bioluminescent forest with this interactive virtual reality experience. Relax and calm yourself in under five minutes while exploring the wonders of a bioluminescent forest with LUMEN, a self-guided, nonlinear meditation rooted at the intersection of virtual reality and wellness.

name: Lucky Night: Texas Hold'em VR
summary: Have an enjoyable Texas hold’em game in virtual room with real players by HTC Vive or Oculus Rift.

name: Lucky Luke
summary: The most infamous outlaws in the old west have broken out of jail, and Lucky Luke is the only cowboy crazy enough to try to stop them. Facing the likes of Billy the Kid, Jesse James and the Dalton brothers, it's up to you to guide Lucky Luke - the rootin', tootin' star of comic books, TV shows and movies - through 12 levels of platform-jumping action across the south-western states of historic America. French development company Infogrames has packed Lucky Luke with a fascinating mix of gameplay elements, forcing Lucky Luke to survive tornados, stagecoach rides, train chases and buffalo stampedes. Clear, colourful graphics bring the old west landscape to sparkling life, with a ramblin' soundtrack that's sure to get your spurs tapping. Chasing bank robbers is as fun as it looks on TV, and thanks to solid play control and plenty of variety in the gameplay - including a heap of bonus games like the Shooting Gallery - you're sure to have a wild, wild time in the old west.

name: Luta de Gladiadores
summary:
It was a dark time forged in blood and steel. The people gathered in arenas to watch violent battles, where only real warriors were able to survive. Amid all this chaos, a story of valor and courage began. Titus, the great fighter, surprised the empire and managed to defeat all the gladiators to be released.

The game is a series of one on one gladiator fights with increasingly stronger opponents. Between each fight there is a text screen with a description of the next oponnent which also serves to advance the story. Winning each fight unlocks progress towards the next weapon, which can be equipped for the next fight. The player can move forward, backwards, raise the shield or attack, all in real time. The strategy is to know when to defend and when to attack.

name: Lust in Space
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting space adventure in the genre of adult visual novel. In the game Lust in Space you take on the role of Leon, an agent of the Peace Corps, who, during one of his missions, finds a wrecked, deserted ship from Earth.

name: Lushfoil Photography Sim
summary: An exploration/photography experience set across a vast selection of faithfully detailed landscapes.

name: Luna and the Sea
summary: A hand-drawn-style point-and-click adventure set in 17th-century Amsterdam. Play as Luna, a young girl surviving on the streets, solving puzzles, and embarking on a journey to find her father. A touching story about kindness, resilience, and the sea.

name: Lucky Hero
summary: "Lucky Hero" is a Roguelike symbol-building game. Your weapons and equipment have transformed into symbols, and by spinning the Wheel of Fortune, you will face various powerful enemies. This game offers a vast array of symbols and character skills for players to explore and combine.

name: Lumines Electronic Symphony
summary:
Lumines Electronic Symphony uses the new features of the PlayStation Vita such as the touch pad on the back, while keeping classic controls already known in the first Lumines on the front.
Lumines Electronic Symphony now uses animated 3D blocks instead of 2D sprites. The game will use the front touch screen controls to move and rotate blocks but will also support analog and D-pad controls.
In previous Lumines titles, a player unlocked skins based on their ability to successfully reach that skin. However, in Lumines Electronic Symphony, an experience point system has been integrated. Now all the points that a player receives in a session are converted into XP, so as the player levels up, additional skins and avatars will be unlocked.
Each avatar has a single player and multiplayer ability mapped to them. Players unlock more avatars and find the abilities that best suit their style of play.
Q Entertainment enlisted the design firm, BUILD (which was founded by former Designers Republic and Psygnosis members), to create much of the game's marketing materials, such as the new logo, in-game font, and graphic elements for the package design.

name: Lumina Rush
summary: Lumina Rush is a single-player speed running platformer. Master speed by utilizing sliding, propulsion, swinging, and teleportation to dominating levels at the speed of light.

name: Luta: Luminoria Tactics
summary:
Luminoria Tactics is a 3D turn-based strategy and collectible card game that delivers fast-paced, cinematic battles. Summon powerful 3D heroes into visually striking arenas and command them with tactical decisions, no “End Turn” button, just seamless, continuous strategy.

Players can level up heroes, upgrade items, and cast dynamic spells to outplay opponents in short, action-packed matches. Every decision shapes the flow of battle, combining collectible card depth with real-time tension.

Designed for both mobile and desktop, Luminoria Tactics redefines tactical card combat with 3D heroes, evolving arenas, and endlessly replayable strategic gameplay.

name: Lust Trip
summary: The day of your planned road trip has finally arrived, and you are almost ready to drive off. Suddenly, an unexpected person joins your trip, so now you have to travel with her.

name: Lucius II
summary:
The story of Lucius II continues where the original left off: Lucius emerges as the lone survivor of the burning wreckage his parents once called home, unscathed from the ruthless slaughter he had unleashed. He had taken the weak and punished the wicked. He had looked through their souls and found the true selves they had been hiding.

Lucius is taken to the psychiatric ward of St. Benedict’s Hospital by unsuspecting caretakers. The Book of Revelation predicts the birth of a child that would end up ruling the world with an iron rod. The first part of this prophecy has been fulfilled. It is time to take care of the rest. Whispers of a prophecy find their way to the boy's ears. Lucius decides to act again to regain his powers. But little does he know of his new adversaries...

name: Lustful Butler and Charming Sisters
summary: Lustful Butler And Charming Sisters is a narrative and casual card game. In this game, all charming girls hope to come to this nightclub for vacation and enjoy the unique massage service. Enjoy this sweet time with them!

name: Luminescent
summary: Dash, slide, and lightshift through a gauntlet of perilous memories on the verge of collapse, in this vibrant precision platformer. Conquer hundreds of hand crafted challenges, unlock lightning quick abilities, and save your boyfriend's life from fading to the void.

name: Luxor MahJong
summary: Recover the stolen treasures of Ancient Egypt in this unforgettable tile-matching quest. Featuring 200 uniquely challenging layouts in three incredible game modes, Luxor MahJong is truly an epic adventure.

name: Luzhanqi
summary: A modern, digital take on the classic Chinese abstract-strategy game Luzhanqi. Deploy your army, outmaneuver your opponent, and capture their flag in this turn-based war game. The battlefield waits for no one!

name: Lust & Magic
summary: Rule your own forbidden academy of magic. Restore the castle, seduce students, and experience explicit sexual adventures.

name: Lucky Villager
summary: Lucky villager - The luckiest villager goes hunting for gold! Take all the treasure from the evil leprechauns before they chop you into juicy bacon in this hardcore platformer!

name: Lunar Stone: Origin of Blood
summary: Lunar Stone is an exclusively designed first-person shooting story in VR. Unique dodging system strengthens combat against the dark force creatures. The magical stones will lead you on a magnificent adventure. With the help of your beloved companions you will find the answers. Let the film made original music consume you and transport you on a journey.

name: Lucius III
summary: Lucius is back. In a whole new narrative experience, he now returns to his old neighborhood of Winter Hill. The path will be a difficult one, with trials and tribulations waiting ahead. Has he made the right choices? Is it finally time to end it all?

name: Lunaria Fantasia
summary: Lunaria, a court mage of the kingdom of Sagittaries, is sent to investigate ancient ruins with her comrades. But the seemingly simple mission goes terribly wrong. The ruins are full of monsters, and a mysterious figure appears and robs Lunaria and her allies of their mana, the source of their magic.

name: Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai Portable
summary: Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai Portable is a port of Lucky Star: Ryouou Gakuen Outousai for the Playstation Portable, featuring new scenarios, redesigned items, widescreen support, and more.

name: Ludo Online
summary: Ludo Online is a strategy board game for two to six players, in which the players race their four pawns from start to finish according to the rolls of a single dice.

name: Lunar Lander
summary:
Lunar Lander is a fan remake of the 1979 Atari game with the same name.

We wasted a lot of quarters on Lunar Lander back in the day. We have to go from memory (ugh), but it seems like the thruster sounds are different and initial landing a little more difficult than we remember. We also remember being able to rotate the ship 360 degrees. That said, it's still pretty close to the original and a great time waster.

Use your left and right arrow keys to rotate the lander and the arrow down to thrust. Joysticks are supported. Like all Crozza Games, the game is portable, so no installation is needed.

name: Lucky Cat Bingo
summary: Daub your way to victory and build the cat haven of your dreams. Experience the excitement and atmosphere of bingo, with a fresh new twist.

name: Luma Island
summary: Luma Island is a casual life simulation and farming game where players explore a peaceful island, grow crops, care for animals, and interact with a small community of characters. The game focuses on day-to-day activities, resource gathering, and simple crafting mechanics in a relaxed, open-ended environment.

name: Luminis: Heal Them All
summary: In an alternate universe set in the futuristic era, a strange kind of virus is wreaking havoc in the wild. Explore, survive and heal the sick with a wide range of resources, equipments and advanced technology. Restore the world from sickness to health.

name: Lust Theory 2
summary: Lust Theory 2 is an adult Visual Novel filled with lust, passion, sex, humor, mystery and on top of that the day is repeating until it doesn't.

name: Luciel Angel Mission
summary: This is the story of the apprentice angel 'Luciel' who loves to study about the world. Once upon a time, all 3 worlds were ruled by God. after the war between The angels are led by 'Lucifer' the anti-God. Defeated and expelled, but then one day he disappeared, no one knew where he was. and gave the mission to Luciel for some reason.

name: Lunch Rush HD
summary:
Run the best restaurant and win the Contest!
Snowy the Bear opens his own eatery and offers fast-paced yet simple fun. Seat hungry customers, take orders, serve food, collect cash and clear tables. Match colors, chain actions and keep your customers happy to earn big tips! Deal with VIPs and don't miss impatient drivers.

name: Lumina
summary: Forge your path through a shattered kingdom in this handcrafted action-adventure. Explore worlds bathed in vibrant stained-glass light, master color-based combat, and uncover the mysteries of Lumina’s fallen realm.

name: Luigi en Circusland
summary: Developed by Topo Soft, Luigi en Circusland is a platformer released for PC DOS in 1994. The game follows Luigi on a quest through various circus-themed levels to rescue captured heroes from aliens, combining platforming action with simple puzzles.

name: Luna Pork
summary: A frenetic catch game only for your Playdate!

name: Lust from Beyond: Scarlet
summary: Stand-alone, free introduction to the full version of "Lust from Beyond" - a horror game with elements of eroticism and occultism

name: Lust Epidemic
summary:
A student of East State University named Brad finds himself stranded at rival college Saint Dame University during a hurricane that has unexpectedly changed course and struck the town.

While exploring the ancient and creepy campus grounds you'll uncover many mysteries and secrets... as well as some sexy fun time with some amazing MILFS!

name: Lulu's Temple
summary: Lulu’s Temple is a mysterious retro dungeon crawler about an archeologist venturing deep inside a horrifying pyramid with only his torch and gun to protect him.

name: Lu Dajishen II
summary: Lu dajishen II is a traditional RPG role-playing game. Its main playing method is to complete the plot task, fight against monsters and upgrade, and collect fashion / equipment. Here you will play the role of a passer-by coming to the miracle land, which is a world respected by the strong. Try to survive!

name: Lucid Clowder
summary: A fast paced weapon based movement shooter, keep on moving and try to predict your opponents movements. Currently in early access, more wepons, maps and game mode are coming alongside with a story mode.

name: Luanti
summary:
Luanti (formerly Minetest) is a near-infinite-world block sandbox game and a game engine, inspired by InfiniMiner, Minecraft, and the like.

Minetest changed its name to Luanti from update 5.10.0 (October 2024) leading to a complete rebranding of the games website and forums

The new name is a combination of the name of the programming language Lua and the Finnish word "luonti" which means "creation".

name: Lufia & the Fortress of Doom
summary: The Sinsitrals, four masters of Doom, arrived in this land on their floating island 100 years ago. You will begin your quest by travelling through time to join in a temendous battle against them--and you will determine the outcome. When you return to present time, you and Lufia, your companion, must join forces with two others to prevent the Sinistrals from regaining control of your world. It will be a long and difficult task--This land is larger than that of most RPG games. And in the end, the balance of fate will be overturned in a contest of love and betrayal that could destroy you all.

name: Lushfoil Photography Sim VR
summary: Use native PCVR support to experience a hightened sense of spatial freedom and immersion in Lushfoil's 10 detailed environments.

name: Lunr.Rdio.Taxi
summary: lunr.rdio.taxi blends drifting and rhythm into an exhilarating spacetime 'Drifthm' adventure! Slide and boost your way through the solar system to the beat of Brazil's best DJs and earn big as an interplanetary taxi pilot trying to pay an infinite debt in this hypercapitalistic BrazaFunk future.

name: Lunar Drifter
summary: Lunar Drifter is an Arcade First Person Shooter, your mission is to tear, blast, and crush an entire legion as fast as possible within the time limit. Featuring 4 playable characters with their own gimmicks and arsenal, more than 10 beautiful hand-crafted levels, and includes online Co-Op!

name: Luminesce
summary: In luminesce you fly through a neon world blasting everything you see, there are many different enemy types in this awesome Shmup!

name: Lumen Rider
summary:
Prepare for the ultimate adrenaline-fueled battles like never before!
Engage in exhilarating combat, soaring through the air on your bike!
Equip yourself with powerful weapons and embrace the rush.
Hold your breath, take aim, and unleash your skills when foes emerge.
From explosive bombs to lethal discs and blazing fire, a wide array of weapons awaits your command.
Conquer cities, deserts, ruins, and futuristic metropolises, and claim victory as your own.

name: Ludominar
summary: Ludominar is a third-person single-player shooter focused on boss fights. Inspired by liminal spaces, the game delivers intense and challenging battles.

name: Lust Night
summary: Lust Night invites you to step into a mysterious world, blending elements of horror and romance in this captivating adult visual novel. A group of friends finds themselves trapped in a cursed house, then murder comes onto the scene and a game for their lives begins!

name: Luce Spenta
summary:
Luce Spenta is a gothic and psychological visual novel that explores morality, guilt, and the human soul.
Guided by Morta —a mysterious, ethereal figure who serves as both judge and reflection— players must decide the fate of five tormented souls through choices that define who they truly are.

Featuring detailed gothic art, haunting music, and more than 25 different endings, Luce Spenta delivers a symbolic and emotional experience that challenges the player’s perception of sin, forgiveness, and judgment.

Every decision matters. Every tomb hides a story. And Morta is always watching.

name: Lupin Sansei: Cagliostro no Shiro
summary: A video game adaption of Hayao Miyazaki's Lupin III anime film of the same name. Released for the MSX.

name: Lunar Lander Beyond
summary: Guide a roster of colorful pilots, eclectic advisors and state-of-the-art landers through a taxing series of missions. Deliver cargo, retrieve resources, and rescue stranded pilots as you navigate a mysterious universe of moons and planets.

name: LUL inc.
summary: LUL Inc. is a collection of over 30 different micro-games that will test your skills in a variety of genres. Can you beat them all and defeat the evil machine?

name: Lunaraxia: Magpie Sings of the World's End
summary: Lunaraxia: Magpie Sings of the World’s End is a Soulslike Roguelite inspired by classic arcade games such as Punch-Out!! and Crossed-Swords with narrative and gameplay loop of Hades.

name: Lucidscape
summary: Lucidscape is a 2D puzzle platformer with elements of exploration and combat. Jump in and conquer the nightmares as you explore fear-centric environments!

name: Lunara
summary: Lunara is a captivating 2D platformer where players explore vibrant levels, collecting keys to unlock doors and progress. With challenges and engaging gameplay, you'll navigate obstacles and strategize your moves to conquer each level.

name: LuminaRun
summary: LuminaRun, a retro-inspired endless runner with two modes: race the clock or test your endurance in Endless Mode. Featuring synthwave visuals, 7 darkwave soundtracks, and fast-paced gameplay, this heartfelt homage to ‘80s and '90s classics is my first Steam release!

name: Lumilight: The Fifth Energy
summary:
The earth has an element called "lumilight" since ancient times, and there are traces of this substance in the air. Appropriate amount of lumilight can help gene evolution and accelerate the viability of species. But if it is excessive, it will produce unpredictable mutant organisms, often causing huge changes in species distribution.

It happened in Ponrigio, a high-tech country that was "nuclearized" by the coalition forces due to some accidents. After the land was bombed by nuclear bombs, a large number of lumilight were detected like a volcanic eruption, and the people called it "the wrath of the earth". In order to solve the increasing number of mutants and mutant creatures due to the increasing concentration of lumilight , the government launched the "Soil Rest Project": elevating the living quarters to kilometers above the sky, away from the lumilight on the surface.

There is a lack of various materials in the sky, and the most serious is energy. Fortunately, scientists have discovered that lumilight can be used as a new energy source that does not lose nuclear energy. But it needs to go to the dangerous old surface to defeat the mutant creatures to obtain it. So the government began to recruit and train "light collectors", a new profession that specializes in exploring the old surface and collecting lumilight for the government to exchange for money. Players need to use three light collectors to form a team and advance to the dangerous old surface.

name: Lunar Lich
summary: Lunar Lich is a puzzle-solving game including puzzle solving, chasing, dialogue options, and a small amount of battle. The game contains a certain amount of horror effects and jump-scares, but the adventure is more significant. This game is very suitable for leisure and entertainment.

name: Lucky Star: Net Idol Meister
summary: Lucky Star: Net Idol Meister is an idol-management simulator in which you must train and turn one of the Lucky Star girls into the biggest net idol.

name: Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles - Digital Deluxe Edition
Lucky Dog 1
summary:
It all starts with the slam of a prison door. Four captains from the same Mafia family, the CR:5, are taken out in one fell swoop and left to rot behind bars.

Lucky for them, our hero’s already there.

Gian’s just a run-of-the-mill wiseguy, passing his time doing petty jobs for the family when he’s on the outside and living the lazy life when he’s in the slammer. But those easy days come to an end when he gets word from the boss: if he can break the captains out, Gian will earn a spot at the top of the hierarchy.

Can he pull off a job this big, or is it more than even Gian’s fabled good luck can manage?

name: Lumines Arise
summary: A mind-blowing, fiendishly addictive reinvention of the puzzle classic Lumines from the creators of Tetris Effect: Connected, where sound pulses through your body, mind, and every block you place, triggering dazzling visuals synched to the driving beat of an infectious, eclectic soundtrack.

name: Lumencraft
summary: Desperate, outnumbered and with gun turrets as your only companion. Lumencraft is a top-down shooter with base-building elements. Drill through fully destructible environment to reach precious resources, and spend them on weapons and tools protecting the last bastion of humanity.

name: Lumina: Resenting Shadow
summary: Journey through a kingdom drained of its life. An innocent being locked away from its own kind, longing to be loved and seen. Though it seems to have forgotten one flicker of hope. You, a glimmer of life not yet fallen.

name: Lu Dreams
summary: A compilation of dreams that you can explore.

name: Lucera
summary: Hunt monsters and level up your character in a retro fantasy setting. Further make your character stronger with rare loot from monsters and by increasing character skills.

name: Luna Abyss
summary: Luna Abyss is a single player story driven action-adventure with fluid platforming and bullet hell combat. Follow the journey of Fawkes, a prisoner of Luna caught between a cryptic prophecy and their prison sentence.

name: LuckCatchers
summary: LuckCatchers is a steampunk themed social online RPG taking inspiration from books by prominent author Alexey Pehov. Carve your own path in this cruel yet magnificent world, in which the sky has become the ultimate theater of war.

name: Lullaby
summary:
You are born a blank canvas. Ready to be painted - and tainted. After all, memories make you who you are. You are born without opinions, fears, aspirations and dreams. Only living life, making memories forms you, molds you.
But... what if, one day... you lost them?
... Who are you then?

name: Lucky Bastard
summary: Married, immoral, and nearly broke — but with a brilliant plan to get rich. Luck favors bastards, but not forever. Sex, intrigue, betrayal, and questionable morals. Manipulate, seduce, or save yourself — your path leads to lust, redemption, or reckoning.

name: Lurking In Fear
summary: Enjoy the love of zombie games without the feeling of being locked down to a story mode! Enjoy a open world zombie era, loot, and explore! OR if you want a change in pace, Play a new round based zombies mode that will keep you loving or Re Loving Round based zolmbies!

name: Luxuria Superbia
summary:
A simple game of touch, pleasure and joy.

Luxuria Superbia is a colorful, musical journey made to fill you with joy. Exciting designs explode from your touch as you glide through playful stylized flowers. It’s all about the experience and the interaction.

There’s twelve flower-like tunnels and a garden with a temple.
In the garden, you select a flower by turning the dial.
When you complete a flower the next one is unlocked.

A flower always starts out colorless.
But when you touch it, color fills the tunnel.
Stay in the glowing flower as long as possible!

Play slowly and gently to get a high score.
Just pushing through as fast as you can will result in failure.
The game wants you to take it easy and be playful.

The blush you cause to a flower imbues the garden too.
For each flower, there’s a column in the temple.
Time spent in a blooming flower makes its column grow.
The garden starts blank, just like the tunnels.
But over several journeys, it flourishes with color.

Bring color to the flowers, bring joy and beauty to the garden!

name: Luminex Quartet
summary: A JRPG featuring music. The curious boy Pato sets out on a journey with his childhood friend Belffie in search of legendary instruments. Eventually, they are bound to a great destiny. An adventure story with full Japanese voice acting for the main story.

name: Lugal: Bronze Age Survival Game
summary: A survival craft game with RTS elements. Build a base, become the leader of a tribe → village → city → state. Conquer neighboring settlements and become king.

name: Luigi's Mansion: Dark Moon
summary: Luigi is back on a mission to remove a bunch of stubborn ghosts from some spooky mansions. Armed with his trusty Poltergust ghost-sucking vacuum cleaner, Mario's brother takes center stage to capture these pesky phantoms. Luigi's Mansion 2: Dark Moon gives players multiple mansions to explore, a variety of puzzles to solve and new ghosts to capture. Armed with the Poltergust 5000, a ghost-sucking, vacuum-like invention, Luigi must complete a number of missions assigned to him by Professor E. Gadd.

name: Luminescence
summary: "Let's make a deal, if you can prove that urban legend is a lie, I won't bother you anymore." Rena is an annoying student. She always shows up wherever Ady is. Until one day, they make a deal. If Ady can prove that urban legend is a lie, she promises to leave Ady alone. Can Ady prove it?

name: Luxo Buddies
summary:
One of the most Classic games which we all know and love!

Luxo Buddies makes its return with an assortment of exciting new features.

Match cards either by matching color or value and play action cards to change things up. Race against other players to empty your hand before everyone else.

Try to be the first player to remove all the cards in this awesome four player Luxo Buddies game!

name: Lunch Lady
summary: Lunch Lady is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. The school final exams are coming up and the best idea you and your friends had was to steal the test answers. Find all 10 pages and don't get caught by the murderous Lunch Lady!

name: Lumiterra: Embers of the Legacy
summary: Lumiterra is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you can battle, farm with your friends, or explore mysterious creatures in a vast world!

name: Lumberjacked
summary: You wake up in a strange cabin deep in a mysterious forest, axe in hand, with only one way forward—through. Chop trees, sell logs, purchase and upgrade gear, and uncover the secrets hidden deep in the forest.

name: Lurkers
summary: Experience the investigation surrounding the Jack the Ripper crimes putting yourself on the shoes of one of the protagonists in this thrilling mystery Visual Novel!

name: Lurkers
summary: Experience the investigation surrounding the Jack the Ripper crimes putting yourself on the shoes of one of the protagonists in this thrilling mystery Visual Novel!

name: Lunnye Devitsy
summary: Lunnye Devitsy is the story of an alien who falls from the moon onto a huge mountainside on the planet below. Explore strange locations, aid mysterious characters and find your way home.

name: LumbearJack
summary: Grab your axe and save the environment by chopping and recycling every man-made thing in your path and solving puzzles with your charming animal friends!

name: Luise and Secret Basement Rooms
summary: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Sasuke KANNAZUKI. Follow daydreamer Luise in her adventures in this traditional fantasy RPG.

name: Luggage
summary: You play as Steve. He has arrived at the airport from a camping trip and has some important Luggage that he must carry with him.

name: Lucha Align
summary:
Get ready for the most exciting fight of your life in Lucha Align, the puzzle game where every piece is a luchador ready for action! Your mission is clear: fit the champions and completely fill the ring to claim victory in style.

With 40 levels full of action, each match brings new shapes, new challenges, and even more excitement. From the first training sessions to the ultimate battles, you’ll need strategy, quick thinking, and the spirit of a champion to master every grid and earn the special stars.

name: Ludaro
summary:
Ludaro is a Roguelike Deck-building dice game with a unique twist on Ludo!

Plan your moves, manipulate dice rolls, and unleash powerful Spirit Cards to beat the score. Upgrade tiles, collect quirky pets and stack wild combos as you battle in epic boss fights with game-changing modifiers.

name: Lurkers
summary: Lurkers is a chaotic 2D multiplayer sandbox where you can build, battle, and survive! Fight zombies, conquer game modes like Bedwars, and unleash your creativity in a world that’s yours to shape and destroy.

name: Lust Lady Friends
summary: Players need to turn over the hidden cards and find the cards of the same color or pattern to match and eliminate them! Players need to successfully match and clear all the cards to pass the level. After passing the level, they can unlock the charming dynamic CG of three natural beauties~

name: Lunars
summary: Gather your friends for the zodiac party game where chaos meets competition! Up to 4 local and 8 online players can customize characters, conquer mini-games, and outsmart rivals with items and power-ups. With 3 game modes—including one where everyone plays at the same time—it’s non-stop fun!

name: Lucky Break: Dating in New York
summary: A Slice-of-Life Dating Sim with AI Full-Motion Videos, set in modern New York.

name: Luna Hop
summary: Luna Hop is a 3D narrative adventure game set in modern Seoul. As Luna, you’ll explore a colorless city, overcome gentle obstacles, solve simple puzzles, and collect scattered moon fragments. A journey born from small courage slowly brings light and color back to the faded world.

name: Luxor 2
summary: The much anticipated sequel to the #1 casual game of 2005, LUXOR 2 sets the new standard for action-puzzlers. LUXOR 2 takes you on a beautiful voyage through 88 all-new, gorgeously rendered levels set amongst the pyramids of ancient Egypt. Use your mystical winged scarab to shoot and destroy the approaching magical spheres, and to help you shoot them down, Luxor 2 features more explosive power-ups than ever before.

name: Lunarity
summary: Management life-sim where you become a magical girl and raise gem bunnies on your own moon. Make them happy and they will reward you with power. Complete cute bunny puzzles to grow your magical abilities. Attend Lunarium academy to learn new spells and bond with fellow magical girls.

name: Luigi's Mansion
summary: Luigi steps out from the shadow of his brother Mario and into the gloomy shadows of a very haunted house in this, his first-ever starring role. When Luigi learns that he's the proud new owner of a creepy old mansion, he's thrilled. Of course, his feelings immediately shift when his brother, the storied Mario, disappears from the house. Now, you'll have to help Luigi track his brother down, making your way through expansive 3D levels. Each stage is packed with ghosts and ghouls to put you on edge; and you'll be armed with a flashlight and a vacuum cleaner to help you capture your foes. Armed with a flashlight and a customized vacuum cleaner, Luigi must rid the mansion of Boos and ghouls -- and find his missing brother to boot!

name: Luminous Plume
summary: Experience thrilling action, epic boss fights, and an electrifying soundtrack in this vibrant 2D action RPG inspired by the likes of Tales of, Ys, Muramasa Rebirth, Valkyrie Profile, and more.

name: Lumberjack's Dynasty
summary: In Lumberjack’s Dynasty you can build your own empire around the fascinating resource of wood. Forests full of trees are waiting to be cultivated, harvested and turned into different products to make your business grow.

name: Luckie Ball
summary: Luckie Ball is a short precision platformer where nothing is fully solid. You'll float to the top of everything! Features tight controls, a custom physics engine, tons of bonus content, and a level editor.

name: Lucius Demake
summary: Lucius game has been demade, and is now ready for mayhem. Enjoy all the gore now in fewer pixels and fewer colors. The original game has been fully demade to achieve the atmosphere of an 80's style gory adventure. Lucius is now killing all the pixels and there isn't a damn thing anyone can do about it.

name: Lumo 2
summary: The isometric icon is back in the sequel to 2016’s arcade-adventure hit, Lumo. Experience a brand-new adventure of shifting dimensions and new perspectives, with gameplay that never stops evolving.

name: Luigi and the Quest for Nothing Revisited
Luminaya
summary: Prepare for an enchanting journey as you dive into the mystical realm of Luminaya. You are braving a mysterious forest teeming with terryfing shadows. Use magical runes strategically to create enchanted orbs of light to drive away the shadows. Be vigilant and escape the ominous darkness!

name: Lu Bu Maker
summary:
Lu Bu Maker is a training simulation game released by Talesshop in 2008. It is available on Steam and mobile, and you can choose English, Korean, and Japanese languages on Steam, but the voice is only Korean.
The goal of the game is to grow Lu Bu for four years.

name: Luxis
summary: Luxis is a game of memory, reflexes, intuition, and problem solving. Get lost in the atmospheric music and glowing world, then find your way out.

name: Lurking Danger
summary: Lurking Danger is a survival horror where Elena and Regina, two diner waitresses, uncover a dark secret. Reality twists into a nightmare as they face terrifying creatures. Play solo or in split-screen co-op, solve puzzles, and fight for survival in a haunting atmosphere.

name: Lucky Pikinini: IMS Intelligence Corp
summary: IMS Intelligence Corp is a Large-Scale First-Person / Third-Person Story-Telling Game with a 13-Chapters Story Campaign, 4-Maps Special Missions & 33-Maps Survival Mode. It Happens Same Time As the Events of Super Incursion & IMS Death Squad. You Take Control of IMS Daryl Kalashi.

name: Lumara
summary: Descend into a corrupted abyss as a lone anglerfish in this atmospheric puzzle-adventure. Solve physics-based puzzles, uncover forgotten knowledge, face mutated creatures, and use your light to push back shadows and restore what was lost.

name: Luckyest
summary: A quick, incremental scratch-and-reveal game focused on compounding choices - set stakes, uncover outcomes, cash out or push for bigger multipliers, and funnel winnings into permanent upgrades that accelerate income and unlock new tools over time.

name: Lunar: The Silver Star
summary: Welcome to the world of Lunar, where reigns the magic and dragons still live. Join Alex, a young adventurer and his companions Luna, Ramus and Nall, to save the land of the Magic Emperor Ghaleon tyranny. Explore dungeons, fight terrifying monsters, and collects local information of where to go along to the explosive confrontation with Ghaleon own.

name: Lunar Echoes
summary: A Geologist on an extended mission of discovery on the moon finds himself stranded during the End of the World

name: Lustless
summary: James, a lonely man, begins his journey of seeking a job after his recent transition to Mediyork City. After it doesn't go to plan, he changes his goal from getting a job, to getting himself a partner by the end of the night.

name: Lumini
summary: Lumini is a relaxing flow adventure game in which you take control over a swarm of innocent little creatures called lumini. After being gone for thousands of years, the balance on their home planet has shifted. With their return, the lumini find themselves in a hostile environment from which you need to keep them safe. On this journey you'll need to find out what happened in the past while trying to restore the balance on their planet. Using their special bond with the planet's energy, the lumini can replenish their swarm to replace their fallen comrades. Evolving their kind into an ever adapting and stronger species.

name: Lust Academy: Season 2
summary: Continue your adventure in Cordale Academy, following up on your previous choices and experiencing all-new content, including: Story, Animations, Locations, Quests and more!

name: Lunar Nightmare
summary: Lunar Nightmare is a retro-inspired sci-fi thriller, set on an abandoned Moon base, where you have to solve the mystery behind missing crew members, ancient discoveries around deep down the Lunar surface, rouge-AI trying to control your fate and ghastly androids to revolting against your command.

name: Lunarball
summary: Competitive 3v3, team-based sport set in space! Kick, dribble and punch your way to victory!

name: Lustra: Lachea’s Tale
summary:
LUSTRA: Lachea’s Tale is a story-rich RPG that combines real-time spellcasting, exploration, and settlement building, set in a fractured floating island realm where ancient magic and mystery intertwine.

Play as Lachea, a young mage shaped by the world around her, learning to lead, grow, and take control of her path in a land suspended between ruin and renewal.

Lustra invites players to see the world through multiple perspectives, to reflect on morality, empathy, and responsibility, and to shape not just the outcome of a magical world, but the kind of person Lachea becomes along the way.

name: Luftrausers
summary: The skies will be set aflame and the seas will overflow with wreckage in Vlambeer's stylish arcade shooter LUFTRAUSERS! Select from over 125 combinations of weapons, bodies, and propulsion systems and take to the skies to battle enemy fighter planes, battleships, submarines, and rival aces for glory, honor, and high scores.

name: Lumino City
summary: Sequel to the award-winning game Lume, Lumino City begins where that game left off. Begin by exploring the city, and using your ingenuity piece together all sorts of puzzling mechanisms to help the people who live in its unique world. Discover gardens in the sky, towers marooned high on an immense waterwheel, and houses dug precariously into cliffs. To create the environment, a ten foot high model city was built by hand and by laser cutter, with each motor and light wired up individually, bringing the scenes to luminous life.

name: Lucky Pikinini: Advanced Killer Cyborg
summary: Nathan Kennedy a U.S. Military Advanced Futuristic Cyborg must race against time to complete sophisticated U.S. Military Super Soldier courses in Nevada as part of The Pentagon's Project-X, A Project Being Monitored And Pending Full Approval by the White House.

name: Lucy: The Eternity She Wished For
summary:
In the near future, androids have become the way of the norm. Emotionless husks of metal have become a part of human society, much to the dismay of the boy. The robot he found at the dump site though, this one was different. It laughed, it cried, it smiled, it has dreams, just like a human…

Lucy ~The eternity she wished for~ is a Visual Novel, about a boy and an android. You play as the boy, who faces decisions and moral dilemmas in this near-future world. This is a story that has touched many hearts and continues to have a strong impact on those who partake in this compelling journey.

The original version of Lucy ~The eternity she wished for~ received high praise for its powerfully moving storyline, following its original release in Korea, 2010. This prompted a kickstarter project which would fund a remake of the visual novel, including its localization to English and Japanese.

name: Luna: The Shadow Dust
summary: Luna The Shadow Dust is a fully hand-animated Point&Click puzzle adventure, brought to life through wordless storytelling, beautiful cinematics and a breathtaking original soundtrack. Inspired by the adventure games of old, LUNA The Shadow Dust is a moving tale of two playable companions drawn together in a hand-animated puzzle adventure, featuring a breathtaking original soundtrack and beautiful 2D cinematics.

name: Lunistice
summary: Lunistice is a 3D Platformer created with simple but fun gameplay and a cute PS1/SEGA Saturn inspired artstyle in mind. Take the role of Hana the Tanuki and jump and fight through her dreams!

name: Luminesca
summary: Luminesca is a chilled-out underwater exploration game which follows the story of a little creature called Lum. Using the light from your esca you can explore the dark watery depths, uncover ancient machinery, and play with a whole ecosystem of strange and monstrous creatures.

name: Lunar Laser
summary: Tap to push you through space. Avoid all lasers and obstacles and collect as many stars as you can.

name: Lullaby of Demonia
summary: As a merchant trading in interdimensional artifacts, you've garnered an eclectic clientele in your travels—one of whom just so happens to be the Emperor of the Demonic Astral Plane himself, Lucifer!

name: Luna
summary: A game about forgiveness

name: Luyen Nguc
summary: Luyện Ngục consists of a total of 26 floors, divided into 5 areas: Ruins, Green Forest, Cave, Desert, and Deathland. Each area has its own story, unique space, and different (cute) monsters.

name: Lunarpunk

Crush your enemies, develop new turrets, enhance those you have and try to overcome the crisis that desolates your world. Are you ready to push forward?

name: Lunar Laceration

name: Ludo 3D
summary:
This is a real 3D Chinese Ludo (Aeroplane Chess).
Unlike the other Ludo games in AppStore, this game provides you totally different experience.

name: Lunacy

Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping Series welcomes back our hero from Mapping at Warpspeed, Zorglo Blaskowicz IX, on another Skillsaw-inspired quest to defeat the enemy aliens encroaching on the cheese production facilities of Luna, and to ingest as much dairy as possible.

Welcome to Lunch Island! Where the sun always shines, everything comes in perfect individual servings and the only meal served is, LUNCH!

Head to the beach and finish the Ice Cream Sandwich event or head to the City and supply Comic Con with pretzels and coffee?

Compete in Competitions! Who has the best Hot Dog on Lunch Island? Who has the best Hot Chocolate?

Compete against other NPC’s in Cook-offs!

name: Lunaform
summary: Lunaform is a puzzle arcade game like breakout, but instead of destroying all of the blocks you fill them up. Swap hexes just in time to catch stars of the same color, and gain energy to build planets!

name: Lucky Morolian

name: Ludoria

Lunch Time in Burger Kingdom

"Wild" (based on "Hutch" and "Cash"), a surfer with long blonde hair. who is the shooter. And "Lucky" (modeled after "Starsky" and "Tango"), is the driver and wields a gun.

name: Luna

name: Luminous Skies: The Pilgrimage
summary: Standalone Expansion Uncover the story across a wider world. Fight challenging battles. Play fun mini games. Gather food and cook it. Harder Difficulty: greater challenges and new story elements.

name: LUS: Last Unit Standing

name: Lush Forest
summary: Stunning adventure!

name: Lumiette

name: Lucky Burst
summary: An epic retro shooter

Lucilla is motion sensitive and also responds to buttons... you choose which way to free Lucilla? The game is free-to-play, Lucilla can survive all 10 levels as 'Default-Ball' and escape the clutches of evil.

One bad roll and you can lose everything. This game doesn't contain any real-world currency gambling/microtransactions.

name: Luminous
summary: Shadow vs Light - Who will emerge victorious?

name: Lucky Stars - Pop All the Stars in Sky
Lust for Darkness: Dawn Edition
summary:
The Dawn Edition is a toned down version of Lust for Darkness with controversial topics being tweaked.

A special edition of the psychological horror of seeking satisfaction on the border of two intertwining worlds. An intriguing plot with erotic and occult themes guides the player's character through the Yelvertons' Victorian mansion and a perverse land inspired with Lovecraft's works and paintings of Zdzisław Beksiński.

name: Lunar Rover Patrol
summary: A clone of Irem's Moon Patrol, Lunar Rover Patrol is a side-scrolling action game, starring a lunar rover.

name: Lunia
summary:
Lunia is a FREE game.

Lunia has some really good things going for it. You start by playing different "Levels" which you can cooperatively beat with up to 8 players, the storyline is relatively good and is told by hi resolution artwork, the dialogue can be pretty funny :).The gameplay is hack and slash which for newcomers to the genre is very fun, not a very steep learning curve. The boss battles is pretty cool with the music to accompany them nice. PVP is a little bit slow but it's ok, Lunia's Strengths lie in it's Cooperative Play. [The-Best-Free-Games.Com]

name: Lunar Lander Mission
summary:
Fly your ship between landing pads in low gravity to compete on online leader boards.
Compare your best times with players around the world. Are you the best pilot?

name: Luffy: Way Back Home
summary: Help Luffy - a little but brave kitten - return home to his family on an extraordinary journey through some stunning, yet dangerous and challenging places, all gathered in this relaxing sliding puzzle game.

name: Lunch Lord: The Doom of Black Philip
summary: You thought you stole a cookbook. Instead...

name: LumberQwaxes
summary: Chop to it!! It's time to get your girl back. You play as Qwackeric in this side-scrolling action adventure. Play through ten lumbering stages. Left and right keys move and up arrow to jump, space to attack and escape to pause the game. Our Hero Heads to Start his new life as a LumberQwaxes!!

name: Luminous Corridor 2
summary:
PSI GUY has powerful psionic powers and a very handsome moustache. but can PSI GUY reclaim the CRYSTALS?

Guide PSI GUY through endless waves of monsters in this twin stick shooter.

name: Lumen
summary: Live your adventure from the Ruby Forest to the fortified city of Bromure.

name: Luna's Eyes
summary: A first-person horror adventure set in a red-tinted otherworld. Use clues from Luna the cat to escape from the otherworldly house.

name: Lulu in Forest of Aphrodisiac
summary: A role-playing game from MoonGlow.

name: Lucky Luna
summary: Lucky Luna is a vertical scrolling platformer in which players will explore temples and dungeons while learning about the past of the protagonist Luna. Interestingly, there’s no jump button in the game.

name: Luminous Skies: A Short Adventure DLC
summary: Adds a few more missions. More characters to select for the party. More classes available for Briar.

summary: Apart from the Year "is a shooting adventure 2D horizontal version of the game developed by Emu Shanhai Studio. The game takes the legend of the zodiac as the background, integrates traditional Chinese cultural elements, and strives to let players experience a strong Chinese cultural atmosphere .

name: Luminyte
summary: In a world full of darkness you have to find your way home. Solve puzzles and find keys and clues to reach the next level. Defend yourself against evil creatures with your trusty lantern. But keep in mind to fuel it up once in a while!

name: Lume
summary: Navigate a world on the brink of oblivion, as a lone guardian harnessing the power of light you unravel mysteries begging to be uncovered, overcome puzzles, and restore life to a shattered realm in this captivating adventure journey.

name: Lucid Trips
summary: Lucid Trips is a Virtual Reality experience which takes places in planetary dream worlds. You explore artistically designed planets with a completely new concept, defining and navigating your avatar in a distinctive way, using hand motion controllers.

name: Luminous Arc Infinity
summary: The fourth game in the Luminous Arc series and the first one not developed by Imageepouch.

name: Lucky Luke: Nitroglycerine
summary: This multi-genre game is based on the famous comics series about Lucky Luke, a good cowboy who draws his gun and shoots quicker than his shadow.

name: Lucky Luke
summary: An LCD game based on the Lucky Luke franchise. It was released in 1984.

name: Lumberjack's Dynasty: Digital Supporter Edition
summary: Enjoy the ultimate Lumberjack's Dynasty experience with this Digital Supporter Edition! This bundle includes the main game and the Digital Supporter Pack and takes you to the forest!

name: Ludoku
summary: LUDOKU is a unique, brain teasing puzzle game, where the goal is to unlock hidden treasures: defy the many traps and dangers to exploit the riches of an ancient Mayan temple.

name: Lumote: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: This edition includes the game and the following: Original Soundtrack. Squish, bop and bounce through the world around you. Lumote is extremely curious, highly inquisitive and adorable!

name: Luxor: Amun Rising

name: Lurking in the Dark
summary:
You can only see one tile in front of you.
Climb the tower, light the candles, and revive the Dark One.

name: Lucky Luke: Nitroglycerine
summary: This multi-genre game is based on the famous comics series about Lucky Luke, a good cowboy who draws his gun and shoots quicker than his shadow.

name: Lunar: Silver Star Story Complete - Collector's Edition
summary: Return to the world of LUNAR, in the completely reworked 32-bit version of the RPG classic. Journey back to a place where dragons yet live, and magic is valued above all else. Join Alex, the young adventurer, as he begins a quest with his friends to save their land from the crushing advance of the Magic Emperor. Explore Dungeons, fight terrifying monsters, and gather information from the locals as you advance toward the explosive encounter with the Magic Emperor himself! Exciting, menu-driven combat will keep you challanged until the last. And, thanks to the storage power of CD and the PlayStation's built-in movie player, LUNAR contains nearly an hour of incredible animation sequences that will get you involved in the story faster than you ever thought possible. Get ready for the ride of your life...

name: Lunic: Possession
summary:
Somehow you managed to get trapped inside a school that has been abandoned since one terrible accident. Looks like in order to unlock the exit you need to put certain pictures inside frames. But who came up with this kind of challenge?

You need to find pictures that are hidden behind locked doors for which you need to find keys. Every playthrough everything is spawned differently.

name: Lust Girl
summary: Lust Girls is a casual puzzle game. There are 12 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Lunar Strain
summary: Lunar Strain is a new Moon-themed episode megawad for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports (complevel 2) made by the various members of Doomer Boards, led by Matador. There are 22 levels plus a credits map but there are also two curiosities in the MAP31/32 slots. MAP31 is a demo map showcasing the new monsters/props. MAP32 is a color swapped version of MAP13.

name: Lucid Deep
summary: Strange things are happening in the land of dreams... dreamers are being drawn to the Lucid Deep, a lovely but dangerous dreamscape where your greatest wishes and greatest fears come true. Navigate through a wide and ever-changing selection of dreams in this action roguelite. What lies in the Deep?

name: Lucie's Potager
summary: Follow the tale of Lucie and her shop as she chases her dream of growing exotic plants in this shopkeeping RPG!

name: Ludum Creare
summary: Solve programming bugs and then defeat those bugs in turn based combat

name: Luigi and the Forest Ruins: Rebooted
Lucid Awakening 2
summary: Play through an engaging and emotional story set in a deep world full of its own original mythology and history. Take advantage of the Dual Soul class system, switching between Pure and Veil classes in the heat of battle, to conquer challenging enemies and bosses.

name: LurkBait Twitch Fishing
summary: A Twitch powered interactive cozy fishing idle game.

name: Luar
summary: Luar is a Yume Nikki and an AN EARTH2 fangame. At the start of the game, the player is given the choice of two characters to play as: Corey or Doberman. The goal of the game is to explore and collect Valuables (Precioso) that change the protagonist's appearance and/or give them new abilities as well as items known as Dream Pieces.

name: Luxar
summary: In LUXAR, you control an extra-terrestrial luminescent organic entity that has just been born and must pass its first survival trials to show its adult peers that it deserves to grow among them.

name: Lucky Luke
summary: Based on the famous comics series about good cowboy Lucky Luke.

name: Lurking in the Shadows
summary: Lurking in the Shadows is a horror-suspense first-person shooter with single and multiplayer game modes; with a wide array of characters to choose from

name: Luminous Skies: Interstellar
summary: Embark on a journey through the stars in a turn based sci-fi RPG. Switch between two clone soldiers and two robust classes. Gather resources and make food out of it. Search for rare weapons and armor through the universe. Build up your friendships with the crew. Play fun mini games.

name: Lucky Fight vs. Ika Musume 3X
summary: Developed by D.C.S. with collaboration from mokonaXVI.

name: Lunar: Silver Star Harmony - Limited Edition
summary: Lunar, also known as the Silver Star, is a magical world brought to life by the Goddess Althena where humans live and thrive under her tender care. For countless ages since the very first human set foot on Lunar, she has dwelt among the people as a flesh and blood deity, ever protective, ever loving. With the aid of the four dragons, creatures of magic brought about by the goddess to balance the flow of magical power on Lunar, and the legendary warriors known as dragonmasters, Althena has cradled humanity from near extinction in to a thriving race once more. However, 15 years past, the last dragonmaster, Dyne, disappeared and the Goddess Althena ceased to appear among her children. Since that time the Goddess Tower has been silent and there have been no dragonmasters born unto the world. Now, during this seemingly rudderless time in Lunar's history, one who proclaims himself the Magic Emperor has set about to bring all of Lunar's inhabitants under his control, and only a single boy, who dreams of becoming a dragonmaster, remains to challenge him.

name: Lucky day
summary: "Lucky day" is a remastered classic 2D arcade game. The main goal is to collect all the coins in a maze while running away from monsters.

name: Lust Dungeon
summary: Lust Dungeon is a lesbian roguelike deckbuilder game where you save your loved one from a deep dungeon full of dick monsters. Collect cards to build powerful decks and defeat your enemies before your loved one sees so many penises she forgets what true love was like!

name: Luminastadt
summary: It's a cosy colony simulation game. Build and expand your colony by designing buildings, roads and infrastructure. Manage resources such as food, water and building materials. Manage housing, healthcare and education to keep your population happy and productive.

name: Lunar // Drill
summary: LUNAR//DRILL is a Couch-Coop Bossfight for two players! Play Luna & Drillian, two aliens with unique spaceships and abilities. Work together to defeat the Mecha-Spider attacking your moon!

name: Luna Story Prologue
summary: A picross puzzle game, telling the origin story of the other Luna Story games and the Moonkeeper.

name: Lucky Boom
summary: A Pang arcade clone.

The trio will have to put their skills to the test to conquer many challenges, defeat countless foes, and explore exotic locations with their various abilities and the help of Elemental Charges!

name: Lucent Bounds
summary: Lucent Bounds is a short and challenging 3D platformer. Make your way through an alien ocean planet by jumping, dashing, slamming, gliding, and swinging about. Avoid hazards, collect treasures, and challenge yourself in speed runs.

name: Lupin III
summary:
You play Lupin, a character who is trying to get money for his sweetheart. You try to take up to two of the six bags from the top and get them to the bottom without getting caught by an enemy. If an enemy gets too close or you are surrounded you can teleport, but there is no telling where you will end up -- you could end up in a worse spot than the one you escaped from! 
After you have gotten all six money bags, you go to meet your sweetheart, but she tells you to get her more money and you proceed to the next level. If you lose all your lives you will be shown being dragged off to jail.

name: Lunar: Silver Star Story Complete
summary: Remaster of the complete version of Lunar: Silver Star Story, released as part of the Lunar Remastered Collection bundle.

name: Lustful Pussies
summary: In Lustful Pussies, you play in third person as John, who has fallen asleep and is dreaming. In this dream, he is the hero of a real action movie! He has to take the Dildo Gun and shoot back from the crowds of excited women who want to beat and fuck William.

summary: You have to defend the lunar outpost against attacks from outer space.

name: Luv Me Buddies Wonderland
summary: The video game will be a charming party game with this features: a collection of mini-games designed for a broad age group of casual game players.

name: Lucky One
summary: "Lucky One" is a visual novel for adults only. A young slob named Fred enrolls in the Department of Linguistics, where he struggles to find a girlfriend, being the only guy on the stream.

name: Lumberhill: Strong Start Bundle
summary: The package includes: Lumberhill + the Powerful People Pack.

name: Lucy's Heaven
